Package Factory

Class DataFrameFactory

java.lang.Object
Factory.DataFrameFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object>, DataFrame
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataFrameCSV, DataFrameJSON, DataFrameTXT
public abstract class DataFrameFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object>, DataFrame, Component
Author:
Marc Sala, Alfred Manuel Class for the operation that contains the dataframe
